**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 2.0 **Price** 14,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Heavenly radiance shines from an active _celestial staff_, a golden staff capped with a pair of sculpted angel’s wings. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _[+2 greater striking ](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2861) [holy ](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2842) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)_. While wielding a _celestial staff_, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that have the [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) trait and effects created by unholy creatures. When you prepare this staff, if you’re unholy, you become [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) 1 until your next daily preparations. **Activate** [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734); **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
  • **Cantrip** [_divine lance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1498)
  • **1st** [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1451), [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1641)
  • **2nd** [_everlight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1518), [_inner radiance torrent_](/Spells.aspx?ID=934)
  • **3rd** [_anointed ground_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1965), _protection_
  • **4th** [_holy cascade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2000), _inner radiance torrent_
  • **5th** [_spiritual guardian_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1688), [_summon celestial_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1695)
  • **6th** _holy cascade_, _summon celestial_
  • **7th** [_ frigid flurry_](/Spells.aspx?ID=916), [_howling blizzard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559)
**Craft Requirements** You’re holy. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
name: Celestial Staff
